docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Type Default Required ami The AMI to use for the instance string "ami-0c55b159cbfafe1f0" no delete_on_termination A boolean value indicating whether the volume should be deleted on instance termination bool true no device_name The device name for the EBS volume string "/dev/sda1" no instance_name The name of the instance string "my-instance" no instance_type The type of instance to launch string "t2.micro" no key_name The key pair to use for the instance string "my-key-pair" no region The region where your resources will be located string "us-west-2" no security_group_id The security group to use for the instance string "sg-test" no subnet_id The subnet to launch the instance in string "subnet-0f9b2238" no volume_size The size of the volume in gibibytes (GiB) number 8 no volume_type The type of volume string "gp2" no

docs.title: Outputs
docs.text: Name Description instance_id The ID of the created instance private_ip The private IP of the instance public_ip The public IP of the instance

docs.title: Resources
docs.text: Name Type aws_subnet.private resource aws_subnet.public resource aws_vpc.main resource

docs.title: Inputs
docs.text: Name Description Type Default Required enable_dns_hostnames Indicate if the DNS hostnames should be enabled in the VPC bool false no enable_dns_support Indicate if the DNS support should be enabled in the VPC bool false no map_public_ip_on_launch Should the instances in the public subnet be associated with a public IP on launch bool true no private_subnet_availability_zone The availability zone for the private subnet string "us-west-2b" no private_subnet_cidr_block The CIDR block for the private subnet string "10.0.2.0/24" no private_subnet_name The name for the private subnet string "MyPrivateSubnet" no public_subnet_availability_zone The availability zone for the public subnet string "us-west-2a" no public_subnet_cidr_block The CIDR block for the public subnet string "10.0.1.0/24" no public_subnet_name The name for the public subnet string "MyPublicSubnet" no region The region where resources should be created string "us-west-2" no vpc_cidr_block The CIDR block for the VPC string "10.0.0.0" no vpc_name The VPC name string "MyVPC" no

docs.title: Outputs
docs.text: Name Description private_subnet_id The ID of the private subnet public_subnet_id The ID of the public subnet vpc_id The ID of the VPC
